gameFiles

Interface UICore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UIGraphic, UIText

    public interface UICore
    UICore is the base of all UIElements and Interactions with the computer.
    Author:
    Mark Wolgin, Josh Davis

      • promptCardChoiceResult

        void promptCardChoiceResult(int pickResult,
                            Card choice)
        Give the player the prompting for choosing how to use a given card. If pickResult is -1, then the card is a scoring card, so show the results. If pickResult is 0, then the card is an enemy card, show the results of its effects and give the player the choices for how to play the card value. If pickResult is 1, then the card is a friendly or unk, give options for value or for effect
        Parameters:
        pickResult - the result of the card processing
        choice - the Card chosen

      • promptValidInfluenceTarget

        Country promptValidInfluenceTarget(Side side)
        Asks the player to pick a country to place influence in, and makes sure its valid.
        Parameters:
        side - The current player
        Returns:
        Country The valid country choice.
